00023 const int nMaxNestedSizers = 20;
00024 
00025 enum teShuttleMode
00026 {
00027    eIsCreating,
00028    eIsGettingFromDialog,
00029    eIsSettingToDialog,
00030    eIsSavingViaShuttle,
00031    eIsGettingViaShuttle,
00032 
00033    // Next two are only ever seen in constructor.
00034    // After that they revert to one of the modes above.
00035    // They are used to achieve 'two step' operation,
00036    // where we transfer between two shuttles in one go.
00037    eIsCreatingFromPrefs,
00038    eIsSavingToPrefs
00039 };

00181 //-- Variants of the standard Tie functions which do two step exchange in one go
00182 // Note that unlike the other Tie functions, ALL the arguments are const.
00183 // That's because the data is being exchanged between the dialog and mpShuttle
00184 // so it doesn't need an argument that is writeable.
00185    wxCheckBox * TieCheckBox( 
00186       const wxString &Prompt,
00187       const wxString &SettingName,
00188       const bool bDefault);

00330 // ShuttleGui extends ShuttleGuiBase with Audacity specific extensions.
00331 class AUDACITY_DLL_API ShuttleGui : public ShuttleGuiBase
00332 {
00333 public:
00334    ShuttleGui(wxWindow * pParent,teShuttleMode ShuttleMode);
00335    ~ShuttleGui(void);
00336 public:
00337    ShuttleGui & Id(int id );
00338    ShuttleGui & Prop( int iProp ){ ShuttleGuiBase::Prop(iProp); return *this;}; // Has to be here too, to return a ShuttleGui and not a ShuttleGuiBase.
00339    GuiWaveTrack * AddGuiWaveTrack( const wxString & Name);
00340    AdornedRulerPanel * AddAdornedRuler( ViewInfo *pViewInfo );
00341    RulerPanel * AddRulerVertical( float low, float hi, const wxString & Units );
00342    AttachableScrollBar * AddAttachableScrollBar( long style = wxSB_HORIZONTAL );
00343    void AddStandardButtons( long buttons = eOkButton | eCancelButton, wxButton *extra = NULL );
00344    void AddSpace( int width, int height );
00345    void AddSpace( int size ) { AddSpace( size, size ); };
00346    int GetBorder() { return miBorder; };
00347 
00348    void SetSizeHints( int minX = -1, int minY = -1 );
00349    void SetSizeHints( const wxArrayString & items );
00350    void SetSizeHints( const wxArrayInt & items );
00351    static void SetSizeHints( wxWindow *window, const wxArrayString & items );
00352    static void SetSizeHints( wxWindow *window, const wxArrayInt & items );
00353 };
